tool_description: Assesses the financial stability and health of suppliers using credit ratings, financial ratios, and business metrics.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs to assess financially

years_in_business.description: Minimum years the supplier should be in business

financial_data_sources.description: Preferred financial data sources to use

error_messages: Invalid supplier_ids: At least one valid supplier ID is required.
Invalid minimum_credit_score: Must be between 300 and 850.
Invalid years_in_business: Must be a positive integer between 0 and 200.
Invalid financial_data_sources: Must include recognized financial data providers.
Financial data unavailable: Unable to retrieve financial information for some suppliers.
Credit assessment failed: Financial assessment service temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide supplier_ids array for financial assessment. Optionally set minimum_credit_score and years_in_business thresholds, and specify financial_data_sources. Returns financial health metrics and risk indicators for each supplier.

credit_scores.description: Credit scores for each supplier (300-850 scale)

financial_risk_levels.description: Risk level classifications (low, medium, high, critical)

years_established.description: Number of years each supplier has been in business
